text: No "contains" option in the filters for landing page analytics? x_x Are we going to have to manually enter each page names to filter out metrics? this seems like a no-brainer feature to add to this tool.
this has been a pain point from the very beginning for me

Hey everyone! I posted an idea on the community. Would love your upvotes and/or input on it:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Calculated-Properties-Create-a-Switch-Case-Function/idi-p/1079254#M200018>

Short version: On calculated properties, let's have a switch/case function OR a HubDBLookup function.
